title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. II, subch. C, pt. 79 - Accounting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. II, subch. C, pt. 79 - Accounting

State Regulations
§ 79.1 - Accounting
§ 79.2 - Disposition of fines, penalties and bail forfeitures

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. II, subch. C, pt. 79

Statutory authority: Agriculture and Markets Law, §§18, 126; L. 1978, ch. 220, § 3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
